name: Lapis
long_description: Lapis is the fastest and most accurate AI Search Analytics Platform. Integrate llms.txt, see what questions users are asking AI models, see where you rank on AI models, and get actionable insights into how you can be more visible and what users are asking AI about. Lapis also ranks you on AI Search Engines without generating spam blogs.
one_liner: The Fastest, Most Accurate AI Search Analytics Platform.
